manpage.name: extracts cover images to files
manpage.title: Cover Image Extractor
manpage.description: coverdump takes an audio track and extracts all of its embedded cover images to individual files.

options.option: show a list of options and exit
the target directory for the extracted image files; if none is given, the current working directory is used
a string to prefix to each extracted image file
The level of output to display. Choose between 'normal', 'quiet' and 'debug'.
